articles.author: David W Cerny, Radovan Stoklasa, Janis Laizans
articles.title: Central Europe braces for further flooding 'apocalypse' as death toll rises - Reuters
articles.description: Residents of several areas of Poland and the Czech Republic rushed to evacuate on Monday as others in central Europe began cleaning up after the worst flooding in over two decades left a trail of destruction and a rising number of deaths.
articles.content: JESENIK/LITOVEL, Czech Republic Sept 16 (Reuters) - Residents of several areas of Poland and the Czech Republic rushed to evacuate on Monday as others in central Europe began cleaning up after the wo… [+5029 chars]
